    • Method Detail

      • checkPass

        public static int checkPass(java.lang.String uuid,
                            char[] password)
        Checks password of user
        Parameters:
        uuid - uuid of player, stored in database
        password - password that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        1 for pass, 0 if password is false, -1 if user is not yet registered

      • hashPassword

        public static java.lang.String hashPassword(char[] password)
        Hashes password with algorithm, depending on config
        Parameters:
        password - character array of password string
        Returns:
        hashed password as string
